title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.SetFromEntity
description: Sets the entity from which to create an extrusion.

parameters.name: FromEntity
parameters.description: Entity from which to create the extrusion: Surface Face Plane Vertex Sketch point

remarks:
You must also set the type of entity using
IExtrudeFeatureData2::FromType
.
